tag_list: fitness, exercise, workout, women, female, canadian, mobile, social, sports, waterloo, health, mhealth, ios, iphone, android
overview:
Maria is a health and fitness fanatic. Whether practicing yoga at K2 base camp, rock climbing 5.13a or demonstrating a human contortion trick from her days as a Canadian power cheer gymnast, Maria is your natural-born Skimbler. She also loves technology with experience in international product and marketing engineering at Google, Flurry and Cypress. With Skimble, Maria blends her health and mobile technology passions to help make the world a healthier place.

Maria grew up in Canada and graduated from the University of Waterloo with a BASci in Computer Engineering and minored in Management Sciences (MSCI) and International Studies in Engineering (ISE).

degrees.subject: Computer Engineering, Management Sciences, International Studies
